page.title: 15A DAY IN CLASS "F"
page.content: In a morning I usually arrive at school by 8.15 a.m. We don't have to be in school until 8.50 a.m. but I come early to help Miss Wadeson-Wilcox who is my teacher. The bell to mark the start of the school day is rung at 8.55 and then we line up for assembly. Assembly lasts about half and hour. We say prayers, sing hymns and have a short story told to us. After prayers we come into class and have our first lesson, which is usually Religious Education followed by mathematics till 10.30 a.m. We then have a short break until 10.45. After playtime we often have a short period of silent reading followed by language activities. We have a lunch break from 12 0'clock until 1.10 p.m. In the afternoons we usually work on our topics and creative activities. On Tuesdays we have a swimming lesson at the baths.
